AmountBadge
===========

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:

Description
===========



Displays the amount of something.

React Properties
----------------

+------------------+--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+
| Property         | Type         | Default      | Use                                       |
+==================+==============+==============+===========================================+
| amount           | number       | \-           | Amount to be displayed.                   |
+------------------+--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+
| tooltip          | string       | \-           | Localized tooltip to explain the          |
|                  |              |              | displayed amount.                         |
+------------------+--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+
